first (and only) crew
Bolothamogg, who I lovingly and stupidly refer to as Bolo","backstory":null,"enemies":"My family but it’s complicated. ","organizations":"My patron is Bolothamogg, Him who watches from Beyond the Stars. He's a non-physical entity that exists as a guardian of the outer dimensions. It ensured that nothing departed the multiverse and that the outer reality remained "untainted."
He is honored by large gaps in architecture and all the empty spaces in the world.
He is the darkness between the stars.
He provides me a weird sense of comfort when I am alone in the world because he is always lurking in the many empty spaces that I have created in my life.
Though locked out of our realm, we can still communicate in the gaps and rarely telepathically.  He lives outside of time and thus sometimes doesn't know if something is long passed, currently occurring, or yet to be.","otherHoldings":null,"otherNotes":null,"personalPossessions":"A dragons bony talon hanging from a plain leather necklace
Belaying pin

"},"proficiencyBonus":2,"traits":{"appearance":null,"bonds":"I’ll always remember my first crew and the ship that rescued me and taught me how to make a life for myself.
I owe my security to my patron. I was at a low point when She granted me magic. 
","flaws":"I never fit in as a child to the point where now I sometimes shape myself to fit in with any company. My true self is a mystery to even me.
I go out of my way to prove myself as trustworthy to the point of recklessness.
I feel a need to make a fool of anyone who spits at my background, either in sailing or because I’m half orc.
I will pretend to be knowledgeable about the arcane. 
","ideals":"Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Freedom. The sea is freedom — the freedom to go anywhere and do anything. (Chaotic)","personalityTraits":"I enjoy sailing into new ports and making new friends over a flagon of ale.
I’ve never read a book in my life but I’ve always wanted to. 
"}}
